projects.title: Passenger-Counter-App
projects.description: This application is designed to streamline the process of tracking passenger numbers. It offers solutions associated with manual counting methods.

projects.title: Quiz-App
projects.description: This application is designed to provide users with an interactive quiz experience. It presents users with a series of questions related to JavaScript programming.

projects.title: Ecommerce-Web-App
projects.description: The Ecommerce Web App is a fully-functional online platform designed to facilitate buying and selling of products or services over the internet.

projects.title: YouTube Clone
projects.description: This is a simplified version of YouTube, replicating some of its core functionalities. It serves as an educational tool for those interested in learning.

projects.title: Bank-Landing-Page
projects.description: The bank app is crafted to provide users with a seamless and secure banking experience. With a clean and intuitive interface.

projects.title: To-Do-List-App
projects.description: To-Do List App helps you manage your daily activities. The app makes it easy to create, prioritize, and track your to-do items with just a few taps.

projects.title: Pacman (using arrow keys)
projects.description: In this game, the objective is to eat all the dots (pellets) while avoiding four ghosts.
